dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: Here’s a quick summary of your account. Go ahead and explore our services.
dashboard.welcomeAlertDesc: You haven't placed any orders yet. Explore our services or add funds to start your journey.

mobileHeader.navDescription: Navigate through your account and features from here.

quickOrderForm.title: Quick Order
quickOrderForm.description: Place your order quickly and easily.
quickOrderForm.fillAllFieldsError: Please fill all fields and select a service.
quickOrderForm.insufficientFundsDesc: Your balance (${{balance}}) is not enough to cover the order cost (${{cost}}).
quickOrderForm.successDesc: Your order is now being processed.

userNav.signOutError: Failed to sign out. Please try again.

ordersPage.title: Order History
ordersPage.description: View your order history and track their status.
ordersPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by ID, service, or link...
ordersPage.noMatchDescription: Try adjusting your search terms or changing the filters.

massOrder.title: Mass Order
massOrder.description: Add multiple orders at once to save time.
massOrder.inputDescription: Place each order on a new line in the following format:
massOrder.discountNote: Your {{rankName}} rank discount of {{discount}}% will be applied automatically.
massOrder.emptyFieldError: The mass order field is empty.
massOrder.dataLoadingError: Cannot process order while data is loading.

errors.quantityOutOfBounds: Quantity is out of allowed bounds (Min: {{min}}, Max: {{max}}).
errors.noValidOrders: No valid orders were found to process.
errors.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds. Total cost (${{totalCost}}) exceeds your balance (${{balance}}).

results.fullSuccessDesc: All your orders have been received and are being processed.
results.partialSuccessDesc: Some of your orders were processed successfully. Please review the errors below.
results.fullFailureDesc: All orders failed to process. Please review the errors below.

api.title: API
api.description: Automate your orders by integrating our services directly into your applications.

endpoints.title: Endpoint
endpoints.description: All requests should be sent as a POST request with a JSON body to the following URL:

add.title: Add Order (add)
add.description: Use this action to place a new order.

status.title: Order Status (status)
status.description: Use this action to check the status of a specific order.

params.order: The order ID returned upon creation.

services.title: Services List (services)
services.description: Use this action to get a list of all available services.

balance.title: Balance (balance)
balance.description: Use this action to check your current account balance.

responses.title: Responses
responses.description: All responses are in JSON format.
responses.addSuccess: On success, returns the order ID.
responses.statusSuccess: On success, returns the order status details.
responses.servicesSuccess: On success, returns an array of service objects.
responses.balanceSuccess: On success, returns the balance and currency.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: View and update your account information.

toast.wrongPassword: The current password you entered is incorrect.
toast.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

toast.success: Your profile has been updated successfully.

avatarGenerator.title: AI Avatar Generator
avatarGenerator.description: Describe your desired avatar, and our AI will generate a unique one for you.
avatarGenerator.promptPlaceholder: e.g., An astronaut in a futuristic suit
avatarGenerator.placeholder: Your generated image will appear here.

errors.noImage: No image was returned from the generator.

adminUsers.title: User Management
adminUsers.description: View, edit, and search all user accounts in the system.
adminUsers.searchPlaceholder: Search by email, name, or ID...

analytics.title: Account Analytics
analytics.description: An in-depth look at your activity and spending over the last 30 days.

dailySpend.title: Daily Spend
dailySpend.description: Your spending over the last 7 days.

categorySpend.title: Spend by Category
categorySpend.description: How your spending is distributed across service categories.

noData.title: Not Enough Data
noData.description: Start placing some orders to see your analytics here.

servicesPage.title: Service Catalog
servicesPage.description: Browse all our available services with prices and details.
servicesPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by ID or service name...
servicesPage.noDescription: No description available for this service.
